Package ex2

Class InitialPollServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • ex2.InitialPollServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet(name="InitialPollServlet",
            urlPatterns="/initialPollServlet",
            initParams=@WebInitParam(name="filename",value="poll.txt"))
public class InitialPollServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The InitialPollServlet is initial all the program need. he get the file name and deliver it to poll class That servlet also take care if the input file is wrong (line in file.txt small then 3 or not a validate file) do post request are not allow do get request forward to the servlet create the question and answers functional 1. get and create the file poll path by stream 2. create the poll and store them in the context
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
